channel.title: Pre-194 Client Loading 194 Cache (Now Lightly Renamed!)
channel.description:
This is a client from the day after the Rs2-Beta came out: 02 December 2003. The cache however is 194.
It took me a bit to get the client to load the 194 cache but I did it. From what I've read and seen, the client is written well, there are fewer classes than a 317, only downside is that this is obfuscated as hell.
Oh yeah and this does NOT connect to the 194 server I released. [b][u][size=14pt]EDIT: If someone can point me in the right direction about learning to write my own basic server for this client, please do. All I want is a successful login, idc about player rendering or anything, it could be Blakescape for all I care.[/size][/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/ta36u9.png[/img]
EDIT: Sunday April 27 2014: Got some login action going in. I cheated a bit but idc. [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/s0y909.png[/img]
NON RENAMED: http://www.mediafire.com/download/2de3bo1poo53925/02+December+2003.zip
RENAMED: http://www.mediafire.com/download/wlszyy9urgwlezq/02+December+2003_renamed.zip
Again, it's lightly renamed so it isn't all crazy looking in the crucial parts.
Credits: Clienthax(Rune-Server) for having the client.

This is a client from the day after the Rs2-Beta came out: 02 December 2003. The cache however is 194.

It took me a bit to get the client to load the 194 cache but I did it.
From what I’ve read and seen, the client is written well, there are fewer classes than a 317, only downside is that this is obfuscated as hell.

Oh yeah and this does NOT connect to the 194 server I released.
[size=14pt]EDIT: If someone can point me in the right direction about learning to write my own basic server for this client, please do. All I want is a successful login, idc about player rendering or anything, it could be Blakescape for all I care.[/size]
